column1: Ollie was at the park, looking up at the sky. Ollie wanted to see a cloud that looked like a bunny. The sky was clear and blue. While Ollie was busy making a sandcastle, a big cloud slowly moved across the sky. Ollie looks up and sees the big cloud in the sky.
